subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson two-putted from 26 feet to win the 36th PGA Tour title of his career, his second this year and his first in a W.G.C. event.
snippet: Phil Mickelson two-putted from 26 feet to win the 36th PGA Tour title of his career, his second this year and his first in a W.G.C. event.
